translations: adj.爬行的；迟缓的；毛骨悚然的；奉承的
n.爬行；杀小兵赚钱升级（游戏术语）
v.爬行；慢慢地移动（creep的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Hurriedly creeping into bed, he groaned.
Has he not been creeping up that stalk these three days?
sentences.translation: 这三天他不是一直在爬那根茎吗？

sentences.sentence: House prices are creeping up again.
sentences.translation: 住房价格又在渐渐上涨。
